医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
结核病的少数遗传变异为改善疫情追踪提供了新见解研究结果表明，宿主内 MTBC 变异改善了传播推断，为理解和控制结核病传播提出了新策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Minority-genic-variation-in-tuberculosis-offers-new-insights-for-improving-outbreak-tracking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Minority-genic-variation-in-tuberculosis-offers-new-insights-for-improving-outbreak-tracking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cca3368-9fc3-433f-877d-f5fb21b6e89c Mon, 02 Dec 2024 11:10:00 -0500 Minority genetic variation in tuberculosis offers new insights for improving outbreak tracking
IL-15提高GPC3 CAR T细胞靶向实体瘤的有效性该研究揭示了 IL-15 在增强 GPC3 CAR T 细胞治疗、改善实体癌患者的肿瘤靶向和 T 细胞存活方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/IL-15-improves-the-effects-of-GPC3-CAR-T-cells-in-targeting-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/IL-15-improves-the-effects-of-GPC3-CAR-T-cells-in-targeting-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64433c86-c0e8-4b34-8535-fdfa80bd23e6 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 10:39:00 -0500 IL-15 improves the effectiveness of GPC3 CAR T cells in targeting solid tumors
研究挑战了长期以来对轴突结构的理解约翰·霍普金斯大学医学科学家表示，生物学教科书可能需要修订，他们提出了新的证据，表明哺乳动物脑细胞的臂状结构可能与科学家一个多世纪以来所假设的形状不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Study-challenges-long-stand-understanding-of-axon-struct.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Study-challenges-long-stand-understanding-of-axon-struct.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5640289-3dcf-41f4-94ec-f63854927696 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 08:30:36 -0500 Study challenges long-standing understanding of axon structure
天然多酚可增强衰老过程中的线粒体功能和肌肉性能橄榄苦苷可增强线粒体钙吸收，逆转与年龄相关的肌肉功能和能量代谢下降，具有广阔的临床潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Natural-polyphen-boosts-mitochondrial-function-and-muscle-performance-during-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Natural-polyphen-boosts-mitochondrial-function-and-muscle-performance-during-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16e3cf4c-b0bb-450b-b419-a632fda8181a Mon, 02 Dec 2024 08:27:00 -0500 Natural polyphenol boosts mitochondrial function and muscle performance during aging
关于细胞如何生成 microRNA 的新见解对于 microRNA 来说，今年是重要的一年。 2024 年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖授予 Victor Ambros 和 Gary Ruvkun，他们于 1993 年发现了第一个 microRNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-insights-into-how-cells-generate-microRNAs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-insights-into-how-cells-generate-microRNAs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6c42847-3c50-4fe4-ab16-5f7de06e9fb1 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 08:18:00 -0500 New insights into how cells generate microRNAs
新研究探索 obecabtagene autoleucel 治疗成人难治性白血病FELIX 研究结果揭示了 obe-cel 在复发性 B 细胞 ALL 中的潜力，可实现 77% 的缓解且严重毒性较低，从而增强 CAR T 细胞治疗的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-study-explores-obecabtagene-autoleucel-for-adults-with-hard-to-treat-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-study-explores-obecabtagene-autoleucel-for-adults-with-hard-to-treat-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5c8b559-e770-49d1-8935-f838c745a5f7 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 08:00:00 -0500 New study explores obecabtagene autoleucel for adults with hard-to-treat leukemia
内脏脂肪被发现有助于阿尔茨海默病的发展根据今天在美国放射学会年会上发表的一项研究，研究人员已将一种特定类型的身体脂肪与大脑中的异常蛋白质联系起来，这些异常蛋白质是阿尔茨海默病的标志，在痴呆症最早症状出现之前长达 20 年。北美（RSNA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Visceral-fat-found-to-contribute-to-Alzheimers-disease-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Visceral-fat-found-to-contribute-to-Alzheimers-disease-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca81a5a-f121-4920-8062-9dad4bea74d8 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 06:15:52 -0500 Visceral fat found to contribute to Alzheimer's disease development
人造石台面工人面临硅肺病风险耐用且有吸引力的人造石台面是现代美国厨房的流行特征，但建造它们的工人却冒着健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Engineered-stone-countertop-workers-at-risk-for-silicosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Engineered-stone-countertop-workers-at-risk-for-silicosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39e7f2da-574e-4f7f-a440-751a2a1a7bab Mon, 02 Dec 2024 06:13:32 -0500 Engineered stone countertop workers at risk for silicosis
天然蛋白质可能提供治疗 covid-19 和自身免疫性疾病的新方法有些人天生就具有较高水平的蛋白质，可以保护他们免受 covid-19 的侵害。于默奥大学对我们免疫系统的新研究可能为 covid-19 和自身免疫性疾病的更个性化治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Natural- Proteins-may-offer-new-way-to-treat-covid-19-and-autoimmune-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Natural- Proteins-may-offer-new-way-to-treat-covid-19-and-autoimmune-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e706e9-a590-4d7d-84fc-e3ac7dc22b80 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 06:11:00 -0500 Natural proteins may offer new way to treat covid-19 and autoimmune disorders
较高的植物性蛋白质摄入量与较低的心脏病风险相关哈佛大学陈曾熙公立学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，植物蛋白与动物蛋白比例较高的饮食可能会降低心血管疾病 (CVD) 和冠心病 (CHD) 的风险健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Higher-plant-based- Protein-intake-linked-to-lower-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Higher-plant-based- Protein-intake-linked-to-lower-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55ffeafe-85f9-4231-8997-39f1aaf63954 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 06:03:44 -0500 Higher plant-based protein intake linked to lower heart disease risk
